## setLoading() function

将[LoadingState](./react-taro.loadingstate.md)<!-- -->注入指定ModuleState

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setLoading<T extends Promise<any>>(item: T, store: IStore, _moduleName?: string, _groupName?: string): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | T | 要跟踪的异步任务，必须是一个Promise |
|  store | [IStore](./react-taro.istore.md) | 指明注入哪一个Store中 |
|  \_moduleName | string |  |
|  \_groupName | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

返回跟踪的异步任务
